## cli-credentials package

## Functions

|  Function | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [isValidApiUrl(aValue)](./cli-credentials.isvalidapiurl.md) | Checks if the URL is a valid WCH API URL by making a test call |
|  [isValidPassword(aValue)](./cli-credentials.isvalidpassword.md) | Checks if a password is valid |
|  [isValidUrl(aValue)](./cli-credentials.isvalidurl.md) | Checks if the url is syntactically a valid URL |
|  [isValidUserName(aValue)](./cli-credentials.isvalidusername.md) | Checks if a username is valid, i.e. either an email or the term 'apikey' |
|  [isValidWchToolsOptions(aCredentials)](./cli-credentials.isvalidwchtoolsoptions.md) | Validates the credentials by trying to login |
|  [wchGetCredentials(aApiUrl, aOptions)](./cli-credentials.wchgetcredentials.md) | Reads the credentials for the given API URL |
|  [wchRemoveCredentials(aApiUrl, aOptions)](./cli-credentials.wchremovecredentials.md) |  |
|  [wchStoreCredentials(aWchToolsOptions, aOptions)](./cli-credentials.wchstorecredentials.md) |  |

## Interfaces

|  Interface | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [Credentials](./cli-credentials.credentials.md) | WCH credentials |
|  [Options](./cli-credentials.options.md) | Contextual options |
|  [WchToolsOptions](./cli-credentials.wchtoolsoptions.md) | Extension of the credentials to also carry the API URL that the credentials apply to |

|  Variable | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [VERSION](./cli-credentials.version.md) | Version and build number of the package |
